article_title: DHS Investigating Havex Trojan Which Targets Energy Companies
article_text: The Department of Homeland Security is investigating whether the Havex Trojan is related to previous compromises of critical infrastructure. Security firms say that Havex has been used to target oil and gas companies.

article_summary:
The Department of Homeland Security is investigating whether the Havex Trojan is related to previous compromises of critical infrastructure.
Security firms say that Havex has been used to target oil and gas companies.
